attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are 18 years old, unemployed and not going into further education, you have to do 2 years National Service. It would perhaps motivate them and teach them a bit of respect, which is lacking these days.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Englishman/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
